verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, Thou and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and thy father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> with thee shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>: and thou and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> with thee shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of your Kohenhood <S%H3550><s%>.

And thy brethren <S%H251><s%> also of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>, bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8685><s%> thou with thee, that they may be joined <S%H3867><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto thee, and minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto thee: but thou and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> with thee shall minister before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of witness <S%H5715><s%>.

And they shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy charge <S%H4931><s%>, and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of all the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>: only they shall not come nigh <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%>, that neither they, nor ye also, die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And they shall be joined <S%H3867><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto thee, and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, for all the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>: and a stranger <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> shall not come nigh <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto you.

And ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>: that there be no wrath <S%H7110><s%> any more upon the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And I, behold, I have taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: to you they are given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8803><s%> as a gift <S%H4979><s%> for the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

Therefore thou and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> with thee shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> your Kohen's office <S%H3550><s%> for every thing <S%H1697><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and within <S%H1004><s%> the vail <S%H6532><s%>; and ye shall serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> your Kohen's office <S%H3550><s%> unto you as a service <S%H5656><s%> of gift <S%H4979><s%>: and the stranger <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> that cometh nigh <S%H7131><s%> shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8714><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, Behold, I also have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee the charge <S%H4931><s%> of mine heave offerings <S%H8641><s%> of all the hallowed things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; unto thee have I given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them by reason of the anointing <S%H4888><s%>, and to thy sons <S%H1121><s%>, by an ordinance <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

This shall be thine of the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things <S%H6944><s%>, reserved from the fire <S%H784><s%>: every oblation <S%H7133><s%> of theirs, every meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of theirs, and every sin offering <S%H2403><s%> of theirs, and every trespass offering <S%H817><s%> of theirs, which they shall render <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto me, shall be most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> for thee and for thy sons <S%H1121><s%>.

In the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place shalt thou eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it; every male <S%H2145><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it: it shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> unto thee.

And this is thine; the heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of their gift <S%H4976><s%>, with all the wave offerings <S%H8573><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them unto thee, and to thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and to thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> with thee, by a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: every one that is clean <S%H2889><s%> in thy house <S%H1004><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of it.

All the best <S%H2459><s%> of the oil <S%H3323><s%>, and all the best <S%H2459><s%> of the wine <S%H8492><s%>, and of the wheat <S%H1715><s%>, the firstfruits <S%H7225><s%> of them which they shall offer <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, them have I given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee.

And whatsoever is first ripe <S%H1061><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, which they shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, shall be thine; every one that is clean <S%H2889><s%> in thine house <S%H1004><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of it.
Havahry thing devoted <S%H2764><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall be thine.

Havahry thing that openeth <S%H6363><s%> the matrix <S%H7358><s%> in all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, which they bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, whether it be of men <S%H120><s%> or beasts <S%H929><s%>, shall be thine: nevertheless the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> shalt thou surely <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8800><s%> redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> beasts <S%H929><s%> shalt thou redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And those that are to be redeemed <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8803><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shalt thou redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, according to thine estimation <S%H6187><s%>, for the money <S%H3701><s%> of five <S%H2568><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, which is twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs <S%H1626><s%>.

But the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of a cow <S%H7794><s%>, or the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of a sheep <S%H3775><s%>, or the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of a goat <S%H5795><s%>, thou shalt not redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; they are holy <S%H6944><s%>: thou shalt sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and shalt burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8686><s%> their fat <S%H2459><s%> for an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of them shall be thine, as the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and as the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> are thine.

All the heave offerings <S%H8641><s%> of the holy things <S%H6944><s%>, which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> offer <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, have I given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> with thee, by a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: it is a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of salt <S%H4417><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> unto thee and to thy seed <S%H2233><s%> with thee.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, Thou shalt have no inheritance <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in their land <S%H776><s%>, neither shalt thou have any part <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them: I am thy part <S%H2506><s%> and thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And, behold, I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> all the tenth <S%H4643><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, for <S%H2500><s%> their service <S%H5656><s%> which they serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, even the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

Neither must the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> henceforth <S%H5750><s%> come nigh <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, lest they bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> sin <S%H2399><s%>, and die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

But the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> shall do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>: it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>, that among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> they have <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

But the tithes <S%H4643><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, which they offer <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> as an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> to inherit <S%H5159><s%>: therefore I have said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, Among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> they shall have <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Thus speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, When ye take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> the tithes <S%H4643><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you from them for your inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, then ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8689><s%> up an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of it for the YY <S%H3068><s%>, even a tenth <S%H4643><s%> part of the tithe <S%H4643><s%>.

And this your heave offering <S%H8641><s%> shall be reckoned <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto you, as though it were the corn <S%H1715><s%> of the threshingfloor <S%H1637><s%>, and as the fulness <S%H4395><s%> of the winepress <S%H3342><s%>.

Thus ye also shall offer <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> of all your tithes <S%H4643><s%>, which ye receive <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; and ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thereof the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> heave offering <S%H8641><s%> to Aharon <S%H175><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>.

Out of all your gifts <S%H4979><s%> ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> every heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, of all the best <S%H2459><s%> thereof, even the hallowed part <S%H4720><s%> thereof out of it.

Therefore thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, When ye have heaved <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the best <S%H2459><s%> thereof from it, then it shall be counted <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> as the increase <S%H8393><s%> of the threshingfloor <S%H1637><s%>, and as the increase <S%H8393><s%> of the winepress <S%H3342><s%>.

And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it in every place <S%H4725><s%>, ye and your households <S%H1004><s%>: for it is your reward <S%H7939><s%> for <S%H2500><s%> your service <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And ye shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no sin <S%H2399><s%> by reason of it, when ye have heaved <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8687><s%> from it the best <S%H2459><s%> of it: neither shall ye pollute <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, lest ye die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
